website_summaries.verdict: A good-quality fajita pan and serving plate set at a very affordable price.
pros: This quality sizzling platter comes with a sturdy wooden base and a pot holder
A ribbed cooking surface raises ingredients above grease and pouring spouts make pouring off excess grease easy
cons: It doesn't come pre-seasoned, so users need to season it prior to using to prevent food sticking and rust

customer_reviews.title: Season this skillet!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to season it properly before using it. Or you'll get a negative outcome like some other reviews said. In any cast iron product you must season it to prevent food from sticking, burning and most importantly from the iron rusting.
customer_reviews.author: ji

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Fajita
customer_reviews.text: I just got them today and haven't used them yet, but I'm already very pleased. They are solid, and look well designed and built - both the wooden trays, and the iron pans. They fit together perfectly and were very well packaged.I couldn't be happier with them - I have yet to use them, but I can't imagine any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Edward O.

customer_reviews.title: Cast Iron Ribbed Fajita Platter Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and they were better than I expected. The cast-iron pans are perfect for fajitas, but they also work great for a couple of hamburgers, bacon, veggies or anything else you'd like to "grill" on the stove (or on a real grill) when you don't need big, round, cast-iron pan. The top varnish on the wooden pan-holders quickly gets toasted, but that's part of it's charm, it goes with the cast iron. The little pot-holders for the handles are great for the table, but a larger mitt is safer while grilling. NOTE: this IS cast iron and you will need to properly "season" the pans before you first use them to keep food from sticking.
customer_reviews.author: P. T.

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmm  Hot Steak at the table.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Great bang for the buck. Seasoning the platter was easy and just as platters in restaurants do, these keep food hot and sizzling, just as described by seller. The wood base chars to a fine color. Buy these, you will be satisfied with the price and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Prewitt

customer_reviews.title: A  Very Pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally tried the platters for ribeye steak which worked out so well we tried Salmon and Flounder as well, It cooks the meat and fish perfectly, keeps them hot when eating and did not overcook the steak or fish. We started out with two and ordered another six. Very easy to clean as well. The smallness of the platters make them perfect for individual servings.
customer_reviews.author: Gus S

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: The wooden base is more orange than deep red as shown. Also, the dimensions are listed as 7.5" x 9.5" it is not. The widest point is under 7.25" x 9". I decided to return and go for the Lodge product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COOKING FAJITAS IS REAL FUN  NOW!!
customer_reviews.text: very nice, perfect size per serving and have great time using these. great prices!!
customer_reviews.author: Satoru

customer_reviews.title: Love My Fajita Platter Set
customer_reviews.text: This platter gives you the restaurant feel and allows the home cook to create and duplicate some interesting meals. I bought two and received compliments from friends and family. It's the ultimate date night at home platter; it made quite the impression on my date. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fajita platers
customer_reviews.text: The two fajita platters I purchased are very nice. The size is good, typical Mexican restaurant more than one should eat size. My platters are a little knotty but this does not affect their usage. I expect they will hold up for a lifetime of use.
customer_reviews.author: E. Schellenberg

customer_reviews.title: Cast iron  durability at it's best
customer_reviews.text: Food came out great very speedy getting here. Love cast iron should last a very long time worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jessamyfield

customer_reviews.title: Nice skillet set
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as gift for friends, but they were excited about using it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for making fajitas at home. Put in the oven and pre-heat to 400 and you get the same sizzle as you get in a mexican restaurant. My kids love it!!
customer_reviews.author: DaveCary

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the platter set a lot.The fajitas come out very nice and tasty.The only disadvantage is that it is very small and as said it is not sufficient for 2, it yields only for one.
customer_reviews.author: anamika

customer_reviews.title: Small, but does what we need it to!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big meat eater, but my boyfriend sure is. I bought this skillet so we could prepare steak since we live in an apartment building with no outdoor grill. Seasoning it was a breeze, but make sure you read all the directions carefully & do EVERYTHING it says. I've never owned cast iron before so I didn't think about the rust factor & let my pan air dry after I rinsed it. I had to scrub salt & oil all over it to get the rust off & then season it again. But now that I'm more savvy, it is holding up nicely & I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Bar-B-Q Cast-Iron Ribbed Fajita Platter Set
customer_reviews.text: Channel awy unwanted fats and grease with special lip built in to platter Cast iron platter with handle, wood based server
customer_reviews.author: rodney

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for a friend
customer_reviews.text: A co worker of mine bugged me to buy this for her after she had eaten at a place where they serve your food on a skillet. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than i thought
customer_reviews.text: It is OK, however it is smaller than i thought...
customer_reviews.author: efrain perez

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality. Base fell apart after 1x use
customer_reviews.text: The wooden tray was two pieces of wood glued together. Not great quality. Base fell apart after 1x use.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Randell

customer_reviews.title: but soaking then wiping clean works best. I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Grill fajitas very well. Not the easiest clean up, but soaking then wiping clean works best. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a last minute wedding gift. Arrived the day of the wedding and it was perfect! Exactly as described in product information. Easy to read instructions on seasoning. Fast delivery and awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: THE Pammy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for an exceptional product
customer_reviews.text: These pans were amazing. they were a gift for my son in law and he loved them. The quality you got for the price you paid, I would highly recommend them again.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great fajita plate
customer_reviews.text: My family uses these several times a month to make fajitas and we love them. They work perfectly, clean well and ascetically look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Waters

customer_reviews.title: Why can't I order as many as I want?
customer_reviews.text: The product is goid however i would like to order more than 2
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Not just for fajitas!
customer_reviews.text: We bouight this set, not just for fajitas, but for meat/veggies after grilling. They work great and keep food hot. Also, the mitts work good when transporting the food to the platters. No unwieldy pot holders to deal with, another nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: S. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Cast Iron Ribbed Fajita Platter Set
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice set for the price. I always wanted the ones just like the restaurants and these fit the bill. They retain heat well and look great. The only thing that takes getting used to is the cleaning process so they won't rust but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for son and his wife- they love it. Heat is on the grill and put steak and Lobster on them- stay hot.
customer_reviews.author: CNP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best little grill pan. Use it all the time. The size is so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Why i love it
customer_reviews.text: This item Is very Well made,also the price is good and it came right on time. I also gave a friend a set,and he love it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with product.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the platter and mitt. The wood base could use a little more quality, but may stand up to a lot of use
customer_reviews.author: Darrel F.

customer_reviews.title: average pan
customer_reviews.text: consider a small ribbed cast iron pan frying pan - much larger & seems more useful product as advertised, would be a nice set if you get 2-3 pans & bases quality average, good for one to two people
customer_reviews.author: dan s

customer_reviews.title: Very bad rust. I cannot get them off and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I doubt this is really cast iron. I got this a few days ago and i wiped clean ( just to remove dust away) and after that this whole pan is covered with rust. Very bad rust. I cannot get them off and they make my hands smell bad and itchy. I want to return but i threw away the box when i opened it. I am so mad, terrible quality product.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Useless.. Way to small...
customer_reviews.text: Too small for anything productive if you have more than 1 person. Way to small.. I understand it's for fajitas, but if you want to server more than one person, it's a 1:1 ratio, so you will need more
customer_reviews.author: Goldy

customer_reviews.title: Rusted the first day
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box, hand washed, next thing we knew they had rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Ubaid

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fajita pan!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect gift idea! I got it for my daughter. She loves it! I have just added another cast iron pan to her growing collection! I love that it comes with the serving board too! It is the perfect size for a dinner for two!
customer_reviews.author: MichelleW.

customer_reviews.title: Steak Lovers, You Need This!
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this to use with my woodstove because it would be durable enough to cook directly on the coals and it has a flat bottom so it can get hot enough on the stovetop to cook. But I quickly found it was the best way to cook steaks on my gas range. Make steaks every week for me and my wife, it is as good as a very expensive restaurant. You have better control of doneness than with a grill, and the pan keeps it hot while you eat. Also saves all those juices to be mashed into potatoes etc. Search "steak cast iron skillet" if you need instructions, you will be thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AFraz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make sizzling steaks. I would grill the steak, slap it on the skillet and eat directly off of it. Its very durable and holds the heat pretty well. If they make this slightly larger than I would give it 5 stars for sure! Since it is cast iron you would need to clean it well, oil it and store it in a dry place when you're done.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chao

customer_reviews.title: These are a bargain. We have two so we ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a bargain. We have two so we can do one for meats or fish and one for vegetables. Going strong 6 years later.
customer_reviews.author: nightlightview

customer_reviews.title: Great Skillet
customer_reviews.text: This was a great find, and a great price. We followed the instructions, limited that they were, and it worked out great. The product is really solid I would highly recommend. I only wish they would have had a little better instructions on how to prepare, care for, and clean. It would have also been great if they would have included a few recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thomas

customer_reviews.title: These are just great!
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say that hasn't already been said. Thesepans are handy for everything. I love ordering skillet breakfasts in restaurants now I can make them at home and keep them hot! Before you consider buying them from Target for $21.99 check them out from Amazon at $10.99 and get two instead of one, plus free S&H if your order is over $25.
customer_reviews.author: 90210 Hillbilly

customer_reviews.title: If you've haven't ever used cast iron!!! ...
customer_reviews.text: If you've haven't ever used cast iron!!! "You must SEASON!!! The Item first...if you don't know wat that mean then get out the kitchen😂🔥
customer_reviews.author: darrell

customer_reviews.title: Makes for interesting dining
customer_reviews.text: After dining out and seeing these used through the years we thought it would be fun to try them at home. Very pleased. They will obviously last a long long time and they add an element of fun to dining at home. A good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Teamsternip

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: The Mr. Bar-B-Q Cast Iron fajita platter set is a very good value. It seems to be of the same quality as ones costing much more. I have only used the platters once so far since I finished seasoning them, but believe I will be happy for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: M & N

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdier and better all around than I expected for the price. Very happy, highly recommend. Probably pick up one more for a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: SCTucker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had always wanted to buy sizzler platters, but since I needed three, I was looking for the right price, which I found at amazon. I followed the instructions very carefully before use so that they will last me for a long time. The wooden base and the handle holders make it very convenient and comfortable to hold. We use them atleast once a week and enjoy homemade sizzlers. This is probably one of the best purchases I have made for our kitchen in some time.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Husband likes his latest gadget for his cooking pleasure. We both love cast iron. Lodge makes durable cast iron cookware & the handle mitts are a great enhancement for the hot cast iron handles.The possibilities are endless for this grilling pan. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Monica A

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: It really helps the presentation for serving fajitas. I would recomend buying more than one if you want to serve more than one person, or two light eaters. The pour spouts work great, and seasoning this was much easier than my Dutch oven.
customer_reviews.author: L. Despin

customer_reviews.title: My Cute Fajita Grill
customer_reviews.text: My fajita grill is really cute. It's big enough to make fajitas for two people (4 fajitas each) The wood plate looks very elegant compared to the others I saw at Amazon. I gave 5 stars to my grill because the quality is great and the price is right! If you want a great fajita recipe look for Paula Dean's sizzling fajitas at the Food Network's website.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: these work very well for the price. Easy to use, easy to clean up. I recommend to those who want a good set cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Atkin

customer_reviews.title: sizzlin fun
customer_reviews.text: We had sizzling steaks at Applebys and wanted to do this at home. We are in the experimenting stage now and have tried the plates once and had great success. I had to season my own and would have liked pre-seasoned,however, we really are enjoying our plates. We love the way the food stays "sizzlin hot". Amazon is a great place to shop.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila K.

customer_reviews.title: fajita pans
customer_reviews.text: These pans are excellent for making fajitas. I make the fajita filling in a larger pan and then transfer it to these individual pans for sizzling. They are great and my grandkids like eating off the individual pans.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Welch

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We own this set and have purchased for gifts. It's quality without breaking the bank. Can't go wrong on this one! You may want to use a little heavier handle mitt, otherwise the set is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: catz

customer_reviews.title: Fajita pans
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, my sister bought another set so we can use them when we have a party !.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for keeping your steak sizzling
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for keeping warm your steak and other meals that fade when lukewarm. Not to heavy and fit well in any oven.
customer_reviews.author: Andre journel

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my purchase of the Mr. Bar-B-Q cast iron set. Very sturdy and exactly what i was looking for. Great quality. The delivery was on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Dian

customer_reviews.title: Fajita Platter
customer_reviews.text: I was very please with the quality of the Mr. Bar-B-Q Fajita Platter Set, everything was included. Cast iron platter, wooden board and handle covers. I am thinking of buying more as a gift for my daughter. Amazon had by far the best price.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Ross

customer_reviews.title: Fajita Presenter
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product! It has a classy wooden base and the skillet is very solid. We have put this in for a regular use since it arrived. Great Deal!
customer_reviews.author: S. Sharan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was hoping for. Restaurant quality. Ordered another four. Looking forward to some fun parties!
customer_reviews.author: B. Baker

customer_reviews.title: For the barbeque masters
customer_reviews.text: This is great for cooking fahitas on the grill . Great product Would recommend for all barbeque geeks lol!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Sandlin

customer_reviews.title: cast iron platters
customer_reviews.text: very happy with the set and the price is the best I could find. great product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: sally

product_meta.title: Mr. Bar-B-Q 06108Y Cast-Iron Ribbed Fajita Platter Set,Black
product_meta.description:
Size:1Cast-Iron Ribbed Fajita Platter Set

AMAZON.COM
If you think Fajitas taste best when served sizzling hot, you’ll love this cast-iron grilling platter. Heavy cast iron absorbs and retains heat at the high temperatures required for searing strips of steak or chicken, as well as green peppers and onions. Ribs in the platter raise the meat above grease, which can be poured off by means of two lips, one on either side. The 7-1/2 by 9-1/2-inch cooking surface produces enough fajita filling for one hungry person, or two who like to share. In addition, the set contains a padded mitt for safety, as well as a 12-1/2- by 7-1/2-inch oval, lacquered wooden base to keep the cast-iron platter from slipping during serving. 

 The fajita platter must be seasoned before first use to create a nonstick patina that also helps prevent rusting. After washing, a thin layer of vegetable oil is applied and the platter is heated for one hour. While the platter can be seasoned on a grill, an oven works best. Instructions for the seasoning process are included. After subsequent use, the platter should be washed by hand and dried before storing. Mr. Bar-B-Q covers the fajita set with a five-year warranty. --Ann Bieri 

 What’s In the Box
Cast-iron platter, wooden base, handle mitt.
feature_bullets: Specially designed channels and pouring lip drains away unwanted fat and grease
